Criterion for actual MNW pumping rate to converge to FMP pumping requirement (QCLOSE)
Convergence occurs when the desired pumping rate divided by the actual pumping rate minus 1 is less than or equal to QCLOSE. (Q
DES
/Q
ACT
-1 <= QCLOSE)
Fraction of reduction of head-change closure criterion if QCLOSE was not met (HPCT)
The head change criterion in the solver will be reduced by the fraction HPCT if QCLOSE is not met.
Fraction of reduction of residual-change closure criterion if QCLOSE was not met (RPCT)
The residual change criterion in the solver will be reduced by the fraction RPCT if QCLOSE is not met.

Minimum saturated thickness of model cell before pumping reduction is initiated. (SATTHK)
If the NWT solver is used, SATTHK is the minimum absolute cell thickness that must be saturated before pumping reduction is initiated.
